articles.title: Why is colon cancer on the rise in young adults? - Yahoo News
articles.description: Advanced-stage colon cancer cases are increasing among young Americans. An expert says the scientific community needs to come together to further investigate...
articles.content:
Colorectal cancer among young people is increasing rapidly. (Getty Images)

articles.title: After US and Israel, India another nation you can't mess with: Amit Shah at India Today Conclave 2023 - India Today
articles.description: "Post India's strikes, the world received a message that after America and Israel, India is the third such nation that no one can dare to mess with," Amit Shah said during a session at India Today Conclave.
